posts.html:
@Leshrac_Nightwalker, those whales in Segovian's picture are supposed to be the size of goldfish, it's not to scale AT ALL. This creature would barely compare to the whale shone in Marhjan.
I'd totally run it in a Ula's Temple deck, if it cost 3 or 4.
5 is just too much for a 3/3 islandwalk.

Bit of a disconnect between art and mechanics. Look at the whales in his entourage! He's scaled bigger than Marjhan at less than half the P/T.

@Dr.Pingas: Oh, I can't defend my comment in the face of goldfish-sized whales! At the date I posted this comment, I don't think I knew that Segovia was a plane. You have to admit, looking at the three whales in Magic, Segovian should really have been bigger.

I guess it's a desperate planeswalker who summons any creatures from Segovia!
